Category: Support receiving and storing order data

Create new order by adding items and applying discounts (percentage or fixed amount)
See order totals calculated automatically (subtotal, discount, final total)

Change order status through defined workflow throughout lifecycle

Cancel order from any status (except COMPLETED)
View complete status change history for any order with timestamps and notes
Filter order list by status (show only PENDING, CONFIRMED, etc.)
See dashboard showing count of orders in each status
View daily sales summary showing total orders, total revenue, and average order value
View hourly sales breakdown to identify peak business hours
Select custom date range for sales reports
